response.answer_text: Yes, and unexpectedly so. The largest ships can be sunk easily, and the sea is merciless with it. It can kill you slowly, or suddenly when you are feeling safe. Posted Missing: The Story of Ships Lost... book by Alan Villiers
depends on how much you are adapted towards its environment. The sea is unpredictable so the more you are aware of it the chances of it being dangerous are less.
